effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power and type are determined by the user’s held berry. The berry is consumed. If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Power and type are determined by the user’s held berry. The berry is consumed. If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Power and type are determined by the user’s held berry. The berry is consumed. If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Power and type depend on the held berry.
short_effect.platinum: Power and type depend on the held berry.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Power and type depend on the held berry.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.
flavor_text.platinum: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.
